description:
Adam throws aside his pride and beauty and assumes the form of a huge monster. It will take the power of all six Symphogear Wielders to bring him down.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Every Time Tears Overlap, the Reality Proven Is
Namida o Kasaneru Tabi, Shoumei Sareru Genjitsu wa
涙を重ねる度, 証明される現実は
